When Constellite Pilgrim leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.
[i]Constellation[/i] – Whenever an enchantment you control enters, obscure the top card of your library. This ability only triggers once each turn. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
